channel.title: New Forum (Shameless self promotion)
channel.description:
[url=http://www.twiceaday.net/DForum/index.php?styleid=7]http://www.twiceaday.net/DForum/index.php?styleid=7[/url]
After some thought, I created a forum. Its based around drugs/life/music etc. Everyone reading this is invited to join, but only come if you'd like to.
And yes, I requested asked moparisthebest a while ago for permission to advertise so no worries.

item.title: New Forum (Shameless self promotion)
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:13, topic:70739”][quote author=Got_Shine link=topic=103955.msg1052398#msg1052398 date=1174880820]
Alright fellix, judging by your post you’re about 11 years old (No joke intended) Reading your first sentence threw me off a bit, “weed is for idiots to post these like threads” Now, personally, I have no idea what in the fuck you’re saying, so I then went and read the line under it “drugies have no life they suck balls off of gay men” I don’t consider myself a druggie, nor any of my friends, regardless, I have yet to see a druggie “suck a gay guy’s balls off”.

I stopped reading there, because realized I didn’t give a shit about you, or whatever you have to say.
[/quote]
its a medaphor - if you suck balls off of gay men aka doing drugs…
and im 12 and im smarter then you, thats sad rofl[/quote]Its Metaphore, not medaphor, your special ed. teachers need to focus more on spelling huh?

Yeah not too much is going on at the moment jme, thanks for stepping in man.

Read full topic

item.title: New Forum (Shameless self promotion)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:10, topic:70739”]weeds is for idiots to post these like threads.
drugies have no life they suck balls off of gay men. Lets just lock this thread. Moparisthebest.com has nothing to do with drugs or to encourage. This thread should be locked :mad:
grow up and dont be a baby and try to act cool and do drugs, thats just ficken gay…[/quote]

Notice how anti-drug people(like you) sound more retarded then what they believe a druggy to be. Weird. People who spam for now on in this thread will be punished so no more posts about why you don’t like the site. I see nothing wrong with it, so I joined Can’t promise too much activity as there isn’t really anyone there yet

Read full topic

I’m leaving this forum, it should be locked…A shine dude, you are prob a drug dealer trying to make money because you have no real life. i suggest this forum should be locked and you leave the community… (noob) I know i will be warned but i did a good cause
